#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, m, i, j;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d\n", &n, &m );
		vector< vector<char> > A( n, vector<char> ( m ) );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			for( j = 0;j < m;j++ )
				scanf("%c", &A[ i ][ j ] );
			scanf("\n");
		}

		for( j = 0;j < m/2;j++ )
			for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
				swap( A[ i ][ j ], A[ i ][ m - j - 1 ] );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			for( j = 0;j < m;j++ )
				printf("%c", A[ i ][ j ] );
			printf("\n");
		}

	}

	return 0;
}
